definitions.definition: ( countable ) A wooden implement shaped like a large knife used to separate the valuable fibres of flax or hemp by beating them and scraping from it the woody or coarse portions.
( uncountable ) The woody fibre of flax or hemp; the refuse of scutched flax or hemp.
( countable ) A bricklayer's small picklike tool with two cutting edges (or prongs) for dressing stone or cutting and trimming bricks.

main_definition: ( countable ) A wooden implement shaped like a large knife used to separate the valuable fibres of flax or hemp by beating them and scraping from it the woody or coarse portions.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The woody fibre of flax or hemp; the refuse of scutched flax or hemp.
( countable ) A bricklayer's small picklike tool with two cutting edges (or prongs) for dressing stone or cutting and trimming bricks.

definitions.definition: A tuft or clump of grass .

main_definition: A tuft or clump of grass .
